short_summary: New Electric Motor Driven Stock Picker Forklift Truck with training and supply
description: This notice is for the procurement of an Electric Motor Driven Stock Picker Forklift Truck with training and related items.
full_summary:
===============

**Electric Motor Driven Stock Picker Forklift Truck Procurement**

**Reference Number:** cb-90-33658711

**Publication Date:** 2024-06-21

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-17T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence has issued a procurement notice for the supply of an Electric Motor Driven Stock Picker Forklift Truck, along with training and ancillary items. This procurement is subject to a Supply Arrangement (SA) under requests E60HS-21FRKL/A.

**Key Details:**

* The proposed delivery date is 180 days after the receipt of the order.
* Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the E60HS-21FRKL/A to be eligible for the bid solicitation process.
* Interested suppliers can pre-qualify for an SA by visiting: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-79868](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-79868)
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Notice Type and Category:**

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under a Supply Arrangement (SA) for the procurement of an Electric Motor Driven Stock Picker Forklift Truck. The proposal process is selective, with the lowest price being the determining factor for awarding the contract.

**Geographic Scope:**

The procurement is limited to Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region) and Canada.

**Contracting Entity:**

The Contracting Entity is the Department of National Defence Headquarters, located at 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada.

**Contact Information:**

Dong Le
Department of National Defence Headquarters
(999) 999-9999

**Tender Links:**

Available information and documentation at: [INSERT LINK TO CANADABUYS]

**Procurement Classification:**

* Material handling machinery and equipment
* Forklifts

Note: Unspsc UN/amdpt is not provided.
